definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: Did Bihar really lie about this rice claim?
sentences.chinese: 比哈爾邦是否真的在水稻產量上造假了？

sentences.english: Bihar’s public services and infrastructure are among the worst in India.
sentences.chinese: 比哈爾邦的公共服務和基礎設施位居印度最差行列。

sentences.english: The northern state of Bihar used to be even more of an embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 過去，北部比哈爾邦是更加讓人難堪的地方。

sentences.english: Bihar should co-operate , invite chinese companies to invest in bihar.
sentences.chinese: 比哈爾邦應當合作，邀請中國企業來比哈爾投資。

sentences.english: Patna, capital of northern Indian state Bihar .
sentences.chinese: 巴特那，印度北部比哈爾邦的首府。
